external_references.source_name: Broadcom Medusa Ransomware Medusa Group March 2025
external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team Symantec and Carbon Black. (2025, March 6). Medusa Ransomware Activity Continues to Increase. Retrieved October 15, 2025.

objects.description: [Medusa Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1051) has utilized legitimate software services such as PDQ Deploy to transfer malicious binaries and tools to other victimized hosts within the target environment.(Citation: Broadcom Medusa Ransomware Medusa Group March 2025)
